full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I SINDHU RA'I DKYIL 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD MDOR BSDUS BYAS TSUL GYI 'DON BSGRIGS MKHA' SPYOD BGROD PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I SINDHU RA'I DKYIL 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD MDOR BSDUS BYA TSUL GYI DON BSGRIGS MKHA' SPYOD BGROD PA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA, ,'DI YANG BLA MA DANG YI DAM 'DIR MOS PA'I BSKAL BZANG SGRON MES BSKUL ZHING, ,RANG GI KYANG TSES BCU RE LA SGRUB MCHOD RE BYA DGOS PA'I SKABS SU BIKshA RATNA SHASTRAS BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI NYI GNAS YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL LO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
